info.name: AssetGo API Collection v2
info.description: Complete API collection for AssetGo Enterprise Asset Management System - Updated with synchronous Predictive Maintenance endpoints (no job queue)

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Monthly HVAC Check",
    "descriptions": "Regular HVAC maintenance",
    "frequency_type": "time",
    "frequency_value": 30,
    "frequency_unit": "days",
    "plan_type": "preventive",
    "is_active": true,
    "checklist_items": [
        {
            "title": "Check filters",
            "type": "checkbox",
            "description": "Inspect and clean filters",
            "is_required": true,
            "order": 1
        }
    ]
}

{
    "maintenance_plan_id": 1,
    "title": "Check oil level",
    "type": "measurements",
    "description": "Measure and record oil level",
    "is_required": true,
    "is_safety_critical": false,
    "order": 1
}

query.description: Required: ID of the assigned maintenance
Filter by risk level: high, medium, low

request.description:
Generate new predictions using AI. Returns predictions synchronously.

- asset_ids: Optional array of specific asset UUIDs to analyze (empty array = all assets)
- force_refresh: If true, clears existing predictions before generating new ones
Export predictions to CSV or Excel format with optional filters
Delete all predictive maintenance predictions for the current company
